solution_line_template: First convert the euros to pounds: {euros_jack_has} euros * {pounds_per_euro} pounds/euro = <<{euros_jack_has}*{pounds_per_euro}={euros_to_pounds}>>{euros_to_pounds} pounds.
Then add that amount to the amount Jack has in pounds: {euros_to_pounds} pounds + {pounds_jack_has} pounds = <<{euros_to_pounds}+{pounds_jack_has}={total_pounds}>>{total_pounds} pounds.
Then convert the pounds to yen: {total_pounds} pounds * {yen_per_pound} yen/pound = <<{total_pounds}*{yen_per_pound}={pounds_to_yen}>>{pounds_to_yen} yen.
Then add that amount to the amount Jack has in yen: {pounds_to_yen} yen + {yen_jack_has} yen = <<{pounds_to_yen}+{yen_jack_has}={total_yen}>>{total_yen} yen.
